description: This file is a C++ header defining the RemotePlugin class within the WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust namespace. It declares the class, its constructors, destructor, overridden interface methods, and private helper functions related to a plugin system that interacts with Rust code, including plugin initialization, activation, message handling, and remote process management.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: A plugin class that interfaces with Rust code and handles plugin lifecycle events, message passing, and remote process control within the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemotePlugin instance with given configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor for the RemotePlugin class.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with a provided shell interface.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns plugin information.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments the reference count for the plugin object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements the reference count.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin, possibly starting processes or connections.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin.

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches a communication channel to the plugin.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches a communication channel from the plugin.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes the plugin's communication channel.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes a callback, specific to certain ThunderVersion configurations.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates incoming tokens and methods, specific to certain ThunderVersion configurations.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Handles invocation of remote methods, with different signatures based on context or JSON-RPC usage.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Handles incoming JSON elements or messages.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Processes response read events.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Launches a remote process with specified shared library, host IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends JSON message data to a specified channel ID.

methods.name: WPEFramework::PluginHost::ILocalDispatcher * Local()
methods.description: unavailable
